## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm interested in learning more about how Verus enables new blockchain creation. Can you tell me about the concept of simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches in Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
In Verus, simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches refer to the ability to launch a new blockchain and a fully decentralized or centralized "bridge" converter liquidity pool at the same time. The bridge converter currencies are flexible and can be 100% asset-backed or partially asset-backed, and all fees generated from cross-chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool are earned on the new blockchain, with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain. This allows for a seamless and efficient way to launch new blockchains with built-in liquidity and interoperability.

**User:**
That's really interesting. I've also heard about crowdfunding currency launches in Verus. Can you explain how those work?

**AI Assistant:**
In Verus, blockchain-based, crowdfunding currency launches allow you to set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in your preferred currencies on the chain. If the minimum levels are not met by the start time of your blockchain, all participants will automatically get a refund of all their pre-conversions, minus network fees. The launch options also provide for maximum participation, pre-launch discounts, price-neutral pre-allocations, and vesting schedules. This allows for a community-driven and fair way to launch new currencies and blockchains.

**User:**
I've also come across the term Notary IDs in Verus. What's the purpose of those?

**AI Assistant:**
In the Verus multichain network, Notary IDs are specified at chain definition and provide decentralized blockchain-specific bridge confirmation. This enables public blockchains to be available to the world for merge mining and staking, allowing for unlimited scale and new use cases. Notary IDs play a crucial role in ensuring the integrity and security of the Verus network.

**User:**
That makes sense. So, what's the overall capability of the Verus multichain network?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus multichain network is capable of creating an unlimited number of interoperable blockchains, allowing for unlimited scale and new use cases. The network enables the creation of multiple blockchains that can interact with each other seamlessly, providing a highly scalable and flexible infrastructure for blockchain-based applications. This allows for a wide range of possibilities, from creating new currencies to building complex decentralized applications.

Let me know if you have any more questions about Verus or its capabilities!
What is the concept of simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches in Verus?

In Verus, simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches refer to the ability to launch a new blockchain and a fully decentralized or centralized "bridge" converter liquidity pool at the same time. The bridge converter currencies are flexible and can be 100% asset-backed or partially asset-backed, and all fees generated from cross-chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool are earned on the new blockchain, with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain.

ols.
### Simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches
- Launch of a world class, worldwide, merge-mineable blockchain along with a fully decentralized or centralized “bridge” converter liquidity pool as part of defining a new blockchain. Bridge converter currencies have the same flexibility as other fractional 100% asset backed or partially asset backed currencies, but is bound to the launch of the new blockchain, runs on the new blockchain, and all fees generated via cross chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool are earned on the new blockchain with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain, only seamless connectivity.
### Blockchain-based, crowdfunding currency launches with minimum participation or automatic refunds, including for dual launches (blockchain and bridge)
- Set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in your preferred currencies on chain. If by the start time of your blockchain, minimums are not met, all participants will automatically get a refund of all of their pre-conversions, less the network fees. The launch options also provide for maximum participation in one or more currencies, pre-launch discounts, price neutral pre-allocations to select IDs that increase the fractional reserve ratio to issue currencies, similarly price neutral carve-outs of proceeds, and pre-launch discounts for early participants. Using VerusIDs, launches can also include vesting schedules in the pre-allocations as well.
### An interoperable, multichain network for new use cases and unlimited scale**
- The Verus multi-currency, multi-chain network allows the creation of an unlimited number of interoperable blockchains in the Verus network. Notary IDs, specified at chain definition, provide decentralized blockchain-specific bridge confirmation, enabling public blockchains available to the world for merge mining and staking, as

The launch options also provide for maximum participation, pre-launch discounts, price-neutral pre-allocations, and vesting schedules.
